patthana7.9:1.1: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana7.9:2.1: Hetuyā ekatiṁsa, ārammaṇe aṭṭhavīsa, adhipatiyā ekūnatiṁsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekatiṁsa.
